jfxtras.labs.scene.control

Class ListView<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.control.Control
          • javafx.scene.control.ListView<T>
            • jfxtras.labs.scene.control.ListView<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable

    public class ListView<T>
extends javafx.scene.control.ListView<T>
    Drop in replacement for ListView. Adds some handy features like a two-way bindable selectedItem.

    • Property Summary

      Properties 
      Type Property and Description
      javafx.beans.property.ObjectProperty<T> selectedItem
      A direct accessable and tywo way bindable selected item property (unlike the one in selection model).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Property Detail

      • selectedItem

        A direct accessable and tywo way bindable selected item property (unlike the one in selection model). If in multi select mode, this will be the last selected item. If you bind bidirectional to this property in multi selected mode, it will keep selecting just one item.

        A direct accessable and tywo way bindable selected item property (unlike the one in selection model). If in multi select mode, this will be the last selected item. If you bind bidirectional to this property in multi selected mode, it will keep selecting just one item.
